Ingredients.6: 0.75 pound sashimi-grade salmon, cut into small cubes

Ingredients.9: 1  red bell pepper, sliced, or more to taste

Ingredients.10: 0.25 cup shelled edamame, or more to taste

Ingredients.11: 4 sheets dried seaweed, cut into strips, or to taste

Ingredients.12: 1 tablespoon pickled ginger, or to taste

Ingredients.13: 1 tablespoon furikake (Japanese nori seasoning), or to taste

Ingredients.14: 2 tablespoons chopped green onion, or to taste

Ingredients.15: 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, or to taste

Directions.2: Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and chile oil in a bowl to make dressing. Mix salmon with the dressing. Divide among the 4 bowls.

Directions.3: Top bowls with avocado, red bell pepper, edamame, seaweed, pickled ginger, and furikake seasoning. Garnish with chopped green onion a sprinkling of sesame seeds.
